summary: The term "white" is used to describe people with European ancestry and light skin color. Ancient societies sometimes mentioned white skin, but they didn't have a concept of a "white race." The idea of a unified white race started in the 17th century during the time of slavery and colonial rule. Today, scientists say the white race is a social idea, not a biological one. They believe that while there are physical differences between groups, the idea of a distinct white race isn't scientifically valid.
title: White people
